entry.title: Die Griechischen Christlichen Schriftsteller (GCS) Online
entry.content:
Roger Pearse in his blog Thoughts on Antiquity, Patristics, putting things online, freedom of speech, information access, and more, offers a complete list of volumes in  Die Griechischen Christlichen Schriftsteller, and links to copies available online.

Die Griechischen Christlichen Schriftsteller (GCS) – volumes available online
Back in 2008, the PLGO group laboriously compiled a list of the volumes of the GCS, with links to online copies.   This useful resource has recently disappeared.  A copy exists in ScribD, but this is not nearly as accessible.  A set of copies can be found in ScribD here.  I have transcribed the list here.
It seems that the GCS series was uncommon in US libraries.  All volumes before 1923 are out of copyright in the USA.  Let us hope that the missing volumes will be scanned and uploaded.  Those of us who do not live at major universities have no other opportunity to use these volumes.
Corrections and additions are welcome — please use the Comments facility.  I have today added a number of links from IA using the searches “Eusebius werke” and “origenes werke”.
Key: Site=IA=Internet Archive; GB=Google books.
